game.name: Meander Land
game.desc: In a world torn by war, it's up to cartographer Corylus Flint to chart out what remains. When he crash lands on a mysterious island, however, he finds himself smack-dab in the middle of mafia territory! Along the way, Corylus meets a variety of strange characters, both friend and foe. Can he escape the island and continue his life's work?
